mutants.code:
def calculate_lost_sheep(friday, saturday, total):
    return total + sum(friday + saturday)

def calculate_lost_sheep(friday, saturday, total):
    return total * sum(friday + saturday)

def calculate_lost_sheep(friday, saturday, total):
    return total - sum(friday - saturday)

def calculate_lost_sheep(friday, saturday, total):
    return total - sum(friday * saturday)
